--- layout: risc_en shortText: Behavior of Cache (Mano) ---

A computer system has memory of size words and cache memory of size מילים וזיכרון מטמון בגודל memory words. Each word has width of bits. The cache is -set associative. The block size is one and te replacement policy is LRU. Each row (from left to right) contains the following fields: valid, tag, value. The following memory acces list is given, from left to right:

The cache is empty before the above access list is attempted.
  1. How many times was there a hit?
  2. How many replacements were there in the cache>
  3. What is the width of one cache line?
  4. What is the most common valye fo the TAG fields after the access list was attempted?
  5. How many valid bits are zero at the end of attempting the above access list?
